00076 /* use this call when executing an operator,
00077  * event system doesn't set for each event the
00078  * opengl drawing context */
00079 void view3d_operator_needs_opengl(const bContext *C)
00080 {
00081     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00082     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00083     
00084     view3d_region_operator_needs_opengl(win, ar);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void view3d_region_operator_needs_opengl(wmWindow *win, ARegion *ar)
00088 {
00089     /* for debugging purpose, context should always be OK */
00090     if ((ar == NULL) || (ar->regiontype != RGN_TYPE_WINDOW))
00091         printf("view3d_region_operator_needs_opengl error, wrong region\n");
00092     else {
00093         RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00094         
00095         wmSubWindowSet(win, ar->swinid);
00096         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00097         glLoadMatrixf(rv3d->winmat);
00098         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00099         glLoadMatrixf(rv3d->viewmat);
00100     }
00101 }

00103 float *give_cursor(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d)
00104 {
00105     if (v3d && v3d->localvd) return v3d->cursor;
00106     else return scene->cursor;
00107 }

00110 /* ****************** smooth view operator ****************** */
00111 /* This operator is one of the 'timer refresh' ones like animation playback */
00112 
00113 struct SmoothViewStore {
00114     float orig_dist, new_dist;
00115     float orig_lens, new_lens;
00116     float orig_quat[4], new_quat[4];
00117     float orig_ofs[3], new_ofs[3];
00118     
00119     int to_camera, orig_view;
00120     
00121     double time_allowed;
00122 };
00123 
00124 /* will start timer if appropriate */
00125 /* the arguments are the desired situation */
00126 void smooth_view(bContext *C, View3D *v3d, ARegion *ar, Object *oldcamera, Object *camera,
00127                  float *ofs, float *quat, float *dist, float *lens)
00128 {
00129     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00130     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00131     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00132 
00133     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00134     struct SmoothViewStore sms = {0};
00135     short ok = FALSE;
00136     
00137     /* initialize sms */
00138     copy_v3_v3(sms.new_ofs, rv3d->ofs);
00139     copy_qt_qt(sms.new_quat, rv3d->viewquat);
00140     sms.new_dist = rv3d->dist;
00141     sms.new_lens = v3d->lens;
00142     sms.to_camera = 0;
00143 
00144     /* note on camera locking, this is a little confusing but works ok.
00145      * we may be changing the view 'as if' there is no active camera, but infact
00146      * there is an active camera which is locked to the view.
00147      *
00148      * In the case where smooth view is moving _to_ a camera we don't want that
00149      * camera to be moved or changed, so only when the camera is not being set should
00150      * we allow camera option locking to initialize the view settings from the camera.
00151      */
00152     if (camera == NULL && oldcamera == NULL) {
00153         ED_view3d_camera_lock_init(v3d, rv3d);
00154     }
00155 
00156     /* store the options we want to end with */
00157     if (ofs) copy_v3_v3(sms.new_ofs, ofs);
00158     if (quat) copy_qt_qt(sms.new_quat, quat);
00159     if (dist) sms.new_dist = *dist;
00160     if (lens) sms.new_lens = *lens;
00161 
00162     if (camera) {
00163         ED_view3d_from_object(camera, sms.new_ofs, sms.new_quat, &sms.new_dist, &sms.new_lens);
00164         sms.to_camera = 1; /* restore view3d values in end */
00165     }
00166     
00167     if (C && U.smooth_viewtx) {
00168         int changed = 0; /* zero means no difference */
00169         
00170         if (oldcamera != camera)
00171             changed = 1;
00172         else if (sms.new_dist != rv3d->dist)
00173             changed = 1;
00174         else if (sms.new_lens != v3d->lens)
00175             changed = 1;
00176         else if (!equals_v3v3(sms.new_ofs, rv3d->ofs))
00177             changed = 1;
00178         else if (!equals_v4v4(sms.new_quat, rv3d->viewquat))
00179             changed = 1;
00180         
00181         /* The new view is different from the old one
00182          * so animate the view */
00183         if (changed) {
00184 
00185             /* original values */
00186             if (oldcamera) {
00187                 sms.orig_dist = rv3d->dist; // below function does weird stuff with it...
00188                 ED_view3d_from_object(oldcamera, sms.orig_ofs, sms.orig_quat, &sms.orig_dist, &sms.orig_lens);
00189             }
00190             else {
00191                 copy_v3_v3(sms.orig_ofs, rv3d->ofs);
00192                 copy_qt_qt(sms.orig_quat, rv3d->viewquat);
00193                 sms.orig_dist = rv3d->dist;
00194                 sms.orig_lens = v3d->lens;
00195             }
00196             /* grid draw as floor */
00197             if ((rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_LOCKED) == 0) {
00198                 /* use existing if exists, means multiple calls to smooth view wont loose the original 'view' setting */
00199                 sms.orig_view = rv3d->sms ? rv3d->sms->orig_view : rv3d->view;
00200                 rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER;
00201             }
00202 
00203             sms.time_allowed = (double)U.smooth_viewtx / 1000.0;
00204             
00205             /* if this is view rotation only
00206              * we can decrease the time allowed by
00207              * the angle between quats 
00208              * this means small rotations wont lag */
00209             if (quat && !ofs && !dist) {
00210                 float vec1[3] = {0, 0, 1}, vec2[3] = {0, 0, 1};
00211                 float q1[4], q2[4];
00212 
00213                 invert_qt_qt(q1, sms.new_quat);
00214                 invert_qt_qt(q2, sms.orig_quat);
00215 
00216                 mul_qt_v3(q1, vec1);
00217                 mul_qt_v3(q2, vec2);
00218 
00219                 /* scale the time allowed by the rotation */
00220                 sms.time_allowed *= (double)angle_v3v3(vec1, vec2) / M_PI; /* 180deg == 1.0 */
00221             }
00222 
00223             /* ensure it shows correct */
00224             if (sms.to_camera) rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
00225 
00226             rv3d->rflag |= RV3D_NAVIGATING;
00227             
00228             /* keep track of running timer! */
00229             if (rv3d->sms == NULL)
00230                 rv3d->sms = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(struct SmoothViewStore), "smoothview v3d");
00231             *rv3d->sms = sms;
00232             if (rv3d->smooth_timer)
00233                 WM_event_remove_timer(wm, win, rv3d->smooth_timer);
00234             /* TIMER1 is hardcoded in keymap */
00235             rv3d->smooth_timer = WM_event_add_timer(wm, win, TIMER1, 1.0 / 100.0); /* max 30 frs/sec */
00236             
00237             ok = TRUE;
00238         }
00239     }
00240     
00241     /* if we get here nothing happens */
00242     if (ok == FALSE) {
00243         if (sms.to_camera == 0) {
00244             copy_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, sms.new_ofs);
00245             copy_qt_qt(rv3d->viewquat, sms.new_quat);
00246             rv3d->dist = sms.new_dist;
00247             v3d->lens = sms.new_lens;
00248         }
00249 
00250         if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
00251             view3d_boxview_copy(sa, ar);
00252 
00253         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00254     }
00255 }
00256 
00257 /* only meant for timer usage */
00258 static int view3d_smoothview_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *event)
00259 {
00260     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00261     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00262     struct SmoothViewStore *sms = rv3d->sms;
00263     float step, step_inv;
00264     
00265     /* escape if not our timer */
00266     if (rv3d->smooth_timer == NULL || rv3d->smooth_timer != event->customdata)
00267         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00268     
00269     if (sms->time_allowed != 0.0)
00270         step = (float)((rv3d->smooth_timer->duration) / sms->time_allowed);
00271     else
00272         step = 1.0f;
00273     
00274     /* end timer */
00275     if (step >= 1.0f) {
00276         
00277         /* if we went to camera, store the original */
00278         if (sms->to_camera) {
00279             rv3d->persp = RV3D_CAMOB;
00280             copy_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, sms->orig_ofs);
00281             copy_qt_qt(rv3d->viewquat, sms->orig_quat);
00282             rv3d->dist = sms->orig_dist;
00283             v3d->lens = sms->orig_lens;
00284         }
00285         else {
00286             copy_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, sms->new_ofs);
00287             copy_qt_qt(rv3d->viewquat, sms->new_quat);
00288             rv3d->dist = sms->new_dist;
00289             v3d->lens = sms->new_lens;
00290 
00291             ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(v3d, rv3d);
00292         }
00293         
00294         if ((rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_LOCKED) == 0) {
00295             rv3d->view = sms->orig_view;
00296         }
00297 
00298         MEM_freeN(rv3d->sms);
00299         rv3d->sms = NULL;
00300         
00301         WM_event_remove_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), rv3d->smooth_timer);
00302         rv3d->smooth_timer = NULL;
00303         rv3d->rflag &= ~RV3D_NAVIGATING;
00304     }
00305     else {
00306         int i;
00307         
00308         /* ease in/out */
00309         if (step < 0.5f) step = (float)pow(step * 2.0f, 2.0) / 2.0f;
00310         else step = (float)1.0f - (powf(2.0f * (1.0f - step), 2.0f) / 2.0f);
00311 
00312         step_inv = 1.0f - step;
00313 
00314         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00315             rv3d->ofs[i] = sms->new_ofs[i] * step + sms->orig_ofs[i] * step_inv;
00316 
00317         interp_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, sms->orig_quat, sms->new_quat, step);
00318         
00319         rv3d->dist = sms->new_dist * step + sms->orig_dist * step_inv;
00320         v3d->lens = sms->new_lens * step + sms->orig_lens * step_inv;
00321 
00322         ED_view3d_camera_lock_sync(v3d, rv3d);
00323     }
00324     
00325     if (rv3d->viewlock & RV3D_BOXVIEW)
00326         view3d_boxview_copy(CTX_wm_area(C), CTX_wm_region(C));
00327     
00328     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
00329     
00330     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00331 }
00332 
00333 void VIEW3D_OT_smoothview(wmOperatorType *ot)
00334 {
00335     
00336     /* identifiers */
00337     ot->name = "Smooth View";
00338     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_smoothview";
00339     ot->description = "The time to animate the change of view (in milliseconds)";
00340     
00341     /* api callbacks */
00342     ot->invoke = view3d_smoothview_invoke;
00343     
00344     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
00345 }

00349 static int view3d_camera_to_view_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00350 {
00351     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00352     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00353     ObjectTfmProtectedChannels obtfm;
00354 
00355     copy_qt_qt(rv3d->lviewquat, rv3d->viewquat);
00356     rv3d->lview = rv3d->view;
00357     if (rv3d->persp != RV3D_CAMOB) {
00358         rv3d->lpersp = rv3d->persp;
00359     }
00360 
00361     object_tfm_protected_backup(v3d->camera, &obtfm);
00362 
00363     ED_view3d_to_object(v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->dist);
00364 
00365     object_tfm_protected_restore(v3d->camera, &obtfm, v3d->camera->protectflag);
00366 
00367     DAG_id_tag_update(&v3d->camera->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00368     rv3d->persp = RV3D_CAMOB;
00369     
00370     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_TRANSFORM, v3d->camera);
00371     
00372     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00373 
00374 }
00375 
00376 static int view3d_camera_to_view_poll(bContext *C)
00377 {
00378     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00379     if (v3d && v3d->camera && v3d->camera->id.lib == NULL) {
00380         RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00381         if (rv3d && !rv3d->viewlock) {
00382             return 1;
00383         }
00384     }
00385 
00386     return 0;
00387 }

00404 /* unlike VIEW3D_OT_view_selected this is for framing a render and not
00405  * meant to take into account vertex/bone selection for eg. */
00406 static int view3d_camera_to_view_selected_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00407 {
00408     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00409     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00410     Object *camera_ob = v3d->camera;
00411 
00412     float r_co[3]; /* the new location to apply */
00413 
00414     /* this function does all the important stuff */
00415     if (camera_view_frame_fit_to_scene(scene, v3d, camera_ob, r_co)) {
00416 
00417         ObjectTfmProtectedChannels obtfm;
00418         float obmat_new[4][4];
00419 
00420         copy_m4_m4(obmat_new, camera_ob->obmat);
00421         copy_v3_v3(obmat_new[3], r_co);
00422 
00423         /* only touch location */
00424         object_tfm_protected_backup(camera_ob, &obtfm);
00425         object_apply_mat4(camera_ob, obmat_new, TRUE, TRUE);
00426         object_tfm_protected_restore(camera_ob, &obtfm, OB_LOCK_SCALE | OB_LOCK_ROT4D);
00427 
00428         /* notifiers */
00429         DAG_id_tag_update(&camera_ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00430         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_TRANSFORM, camera_ob);
00431         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00432     }
00433     else {
00434         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00435     }
00436 }
00437 
00438 static int view3d_camera_to_view_selected_poll(bContext *C)
00439 {
00440     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00441     if (v3d && v3d->camera && v3d->camera->id.lib == NULL) {
00442         RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00443         if (rv3d) {
00444             if (rv3d->is_persp == FALSE) {
00445                 CTX_wm_operator_poll_msg_set(C, "Only valid for a perspective camera view");
00446             }
00447             else if (!rv3d->viewlock) {
00448                 return 1;
00449             }
00450         }
00451     }
00452 
00453     return 0;
00454 }

00471 
00472 static int view3d_setobjectascamera_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00473 {   
00474     View3D *v3d;
00475     ARegion *ar;
00476     RegionView3D *rv3d;
00477 
00478     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00479     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00480 
00481     /* no NULL check is needed, poll checks */
00482     ED_view3d_context_user_region(C, &v3d, &ar);
00483     rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00484 
00485     if (ob) {
00486         Object *camera_old = (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) ? V3D_CAMERA_SCENE(scene, v3d) : NULL;
00487         rv3d->persp = RV3D_CAMOB;
00488         v3d->camera = ob;
00489         if (v3d->scenelock)
00490             scene->camera = ob;
00491 
00492         if (camera_old != ob) /* unlikely but looks like a glitch when set to the same */
00493             smooth_view(C, v3d, ar, camera_old, v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, &rv3d->dist, &v3d->lens);
00494 
00495         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_RENDER_OPTIONS | NC_OBJECT | ND_DRAW, CTX_data_scene(C));
00496     }
00497     
00498     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00499 }

00504     ARegion *ar_dummy;

00507 }

00525 /* ********************************** */
00526 
00527 void ED_view3d_calc_clipping(BoundBox *bb, float planes[4][4], bglMats *mats, const rcti *rect)
00528 {
00529     float modelview[4][4];
00530     double xs, ys, p[3];
00531     int val, flip_sign, a;
00532 
00533     /* near zero floating point values can give issues with gluUnProject
00534      * in side view on some implementations */
00535     if (fabs(mats->modelview[0]) < 1e-6) mats->modelview[0] = 0.0;
00536     if (fabs(mats->modelview[5]) < 1e-6) mats->modelview[5] = 0.0;
00537 
00538     /* Set up viewport so that gluUnProject will give correct values */
00539     mats->viewport[0] = 0;
00540     mats->viewport[1] = 0;
00541 
00542     /* four clipping planes and bounding volume */
00543     /* first do the bounding volume */
00544     for (val = 0; val < 4; val++) {
00545         xs = (val == 0 || val == 3) ? rect->xmin : rect->xmax;
00546         ys = (val == 0 || val == 1) ? rect->ymin : rect->ymax;
00547 
00548         gluUnProject(xs, ys, 0.0, mats->modelview, mats->projection, mats->viewport, &p[0], &p[1], &p[2]);
00549         copy_v3fl_v3db(bb->vec[val], p);
00550 
00551         gluUnProject(xs, ys, 1.0, mats->modelview, mats->projection, mats->viewport, &p[0], &p[1], &p[2]);
00552         copy_v3fl_v3db(bb->vec[4 + val], p);
00553     }
00554 
00555     /* verify if we have negative scale. doing the transform before cross
00556      * product flips the sign of the vector compared to doing cross product
00557      * before transform then, so we correct for that. */
00558     for (a = 0; a < 16; a++)
00559         ((float *)modelview)[a] = mats->modelview[a];
00560     flip_sign = is_negative_m4(modelview);
00561 
00562     /* then plane equations */
00563     for (val = 0; val < 4; val++) {
00564 
00565         normal_tri_v3(planes[val], bb->vec[val], bb->vec[val == 3 ? 0 : val + 1], bb->vec[val + 4]);
00566 
00567         if (flip_sign)
00568             negate_v3(planes[val]);
00569 
00570         planes[val][3] = -planes[val][0] * bb->vec[val][0]
00571                          - planes[val][1] * bb->vec[val][1]
00572                          - planes[val][2] * bb->vec[val][2];
00573     }
00574 }
00575 
00576 /* create intersection coordinates in view Z direction at mouse coordinates */
00577 void ED_view3d_win_to_segment_clip(ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d, const float mval[2], float ray_start[3], float ray_end[3])
00578 {
00579     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00580     
00581     if (rv3d->is_persp) {
00582         float vec[3];
00583         ED_view3d_win_to_vector(ar, mval, vec);
00584 
00585         copy_v3_v3(ray_start, rv3d->viewinv[3]);
00586         madd_v3_v3v3fl(ray_start, rv3d->viewinv[3], vec, v3d->near);
00587         madd_v3_v3v3fl(ray_end, rv3d->viewinv[3], vec, v3d->far);
00588     }
00589     else {
00590         float vec[4];
00591         vec[0] = 2.0f * mval[0] / ar->winx - 1;
00592         vec[1] = 2.0f * mval[1] / ar->winy - 1;
00593         vec[2] = 0.0f;
00594         vec[3] = 1.0f;
00595         
00596         mul_m4_v4(rv3d->persinv, vec);
00597         
00598         madd_v3_v3v3fl(ray_start, vec, rv3d->viewinv[2],  1000.0f);
00599         madd_v3_v3v3fl(ray_end, vec, rv3d->viewinv[2], -1000.0f);
00600     }
00601 
00602     /* clipping */
00603     if (rv3d->rflag & RV3D_CLIPPING) {
00604         int a;
00605         for (a = 0; a < 4; a++) {
00606             clip_line_plane(ray_start, ray_end, rv3d->clip[a]);
00607         }
00608     }
00609 }
00610 
00611 /* create intersection ray in view Z direction at mouse coordinates */
00612 void ED_view3d_win_to_ray(ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d, const float mval[2], float ray_start[3], float ray_normal[3])
00613 {
00614     float ray_end[3];
00615     
00616     ED_view3d_win_to_segment_clip(ar, v3d, mval, ray_start, ray_end);
00617     sub_v3_v3v3(ray_normal, ray_end, ray_start);
00618     normalize_v3(ray_normal);
00619 }
00620 
00621 void ED_view3d_global_to_vector(RegionView3D *rv3d, const float coord[3], float vec[3])
00622 {
00623     if (rv3d->is_persp) {
00624         float p1[4], p2[4];
00625 
00626         copy_v3_v3(p1, coord);
00627         p1[3] = 1.0f;
00628         copy_v3_v3(p2, p1);
00629         p2[3] = 1.0f;
00630         mul_m4_v4(rv3d->viewmat, p2);
00631 
00632         mul_v3_fl(p2, 2.0f);
00633 
00634         mul_m4_v4(rv3d->viewinv, p2);
00635 
00636         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, p1, p2);
00637     }
00638     else {
00639         copy_v3_v3(vec, rv3d->viewinv[2]);
00640     }
00641     normalize_v3(vec);
00642 }
00643 
00644 int initgrabz(RegionView3D *rv3d, float x, float y, float z)
00645 {
00646     int flip = FALSE;
00647     if (rv3d == NULL) return flip;
00648     rv3d->zfac = rv3d->persmat[0][3] * x + rv3d->persmat[1][3] * y + rv3d->persmat[2][3] * z + rv3d->persmat[3][3];
00649     if (rv3d->zfac < 0.0f)
00650         flip = TRUE;
00651     /* if x,y,z is exactly the viewport offset, zfac is 0 and we don't want that 
00652      * (accounting for near zero values)
00653      */
00654     if (rv3d->zfac < 1.e-6f && rv3d->zfac > -1.e-6f) rv3d->zfac = 1.0f;
00655     
00656     /* Negative zfac means x, y, z was behind the camera (in perspective).
00657      * This gives flipped directions, so revert back to ok default case.
00658      */
00659     /* NOTE: I've changed this to flip zfac to be positive again for now so that GPencil draws ok
00660      * Aligorith, 2009Aug31 */
00661     //if (rv3d->zfac < 0.0f) rv3d->zfac = 1.0f;
00662     if (rv3d->zfac < 0.0f) rv3d->zfac = -rv3d->zfac;
00663     
00664     return flip;
00665 }
00666 
00667 void ED_view3d_win_to_3d(ARegion *ar, const float depth_pt[3], const float mval[2], float out[3])
00668 {
00669     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00670     
00671     float line_sta[3];
00672     float line_end[3];
00673 
00674     if (rv3d->is_persp) {
00675         float mousevec[3];
00676         copy_v3_v3(line_sta, rv3d->viewinv[3]);
00677         ED_view3d_win_to_vector(ar, mval, mousevec);
00678         add_v3_v3v3(line_end, line_sta, mousevec);
00679 
00680         if (isect_line_plane_v3(out, line_sta, line_end, depth_pt, rv3d->viewinv[2], TRUE) == 0) {
00681             /* highly unlikely to ever happen, mouse vec paralelle with view plane */
00682             zero_v3(out);
00683         }
00684     }
00685     else {
00686         const float dx = (2.0f * mval[0] / (float)ar->winx) - 1.0f;
00687         const float dy = (2.0f * mval[1] / (float)ar->winy) - 1.0f;
00688         line_sta[0] = (rv3d->persinv[0][0] * dx) + (rv3d->persinv[1][0] * dy) + rv3d->viewinv[3][0];
00689         line_sta[1] = (rv3d->persinv[0][1] * dx) + (rv3d->persinv[1][1] * dy) + rv3d->viewinv[3][1];
00690         line_sta[2] = (rv3d->persinv[0][2] * dx) + (rv3d->persinv[1][2] * dy) + rv3d->viewinv[3][2];
00691 
00692         add_v3_v3v3(line_end, line_sta, rv3d->viewinv[2]);
00693         closest_to_line_v3(out, depth_pt, line_sta, line_end);
00694     }
00695 }
00696 
00697 /* always call initgrabz */
00698 /* only to detect delta motion */
00699 void ED_view3d_win_to_delta(ARegion *ar, const float mval[2], float out[3])
00700 {
00701     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00702     float dx, dy;
00703     
00704     dx = 2.0f * mval[0] * rv3d->zfac / ar->winx;
00705     dy = 2.0f * mval[1] * rv3d->zfac / ar->winy;
00706     
00707     out[0] = (rv3d->persinv[0][0] * dx + rv3d->persinv[1][0] * dy);
00708     out[1] = (rv3d->persinv[0][1] * dx + rv3d->persinv[1][1] * dy);
00709     out[2] = (rv3d->persinv[0][2] * dx + rv3d->persinv[1][2] * dy);
00710 }
00711 
00712 /* doesn't rely on initgrabz */
00713 /* for perspective view, get the vector direction to
00714  * the mouse cursor as a normalized vector */
00715 void ED_view3d_win_to_vector(ARegion *ar, const float mval[2], float out[3])
00716 {
00717     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00718 
00719     if (rv3d->is_persp) {
00720         out[0] = 2.0f * (mval[0] / ar->winx) - 1.0f;
00721         out[1] = 2.0f * (mval[1] / ar->winy) - 1.0f;
00722         out[2] = -0.5f;
00723         mul_project_m4_v3(rv3d->persinv, out);
00724         sub_v3_v3(out, rv3d->viewinv[3]);
00725     }
00726     else {
00727         copy_v3_v3(out, rv3d->viewinv[2]);
00728     }
00729     normalize_v3(out);
00730 }
00731 
00732 float ED_view3d_depth_read_cached(ViewContext *vc, int x, int y)
00733 {
00734     ViewDepths *vd = vc->rv3d->depths;
00735         
00736     x -= vc->ar->winrct.xmin;
00737     y -= vc->ar->winrct.ymin;
00738 
00739     if (vd && vd->depths && x > 0 && y > 0 && x < vd->w && y < vd->h)
00740         return vd->depths[y * vd->w + x];
00741     else
00742         return 1;
00743 }
00744 
00745 void ED_view3d_depth_tag_update(RegionView3D *rv3d)
00746 {
00747     if (rv3d->depths)
00748         rv3d->depths->damaged = 1;
00749 }
00750 
00751 void ED_view3d_ob_project_mat_get(RegionView3D *rv3d, Object *ob, float pmat[4][4])
00752 {
00753     float vmat[4][4];
00754     
00755     mult_m4_m4m4(vmat, rv3d->viewmat, ob->obmat);
00756     mult_m4_m4m4(pmat, rv3d->winmat, vmat);
00757 }
00758 
00759 /* Uses window coordinates (x,y) and depth component z to find a point in
00760  * modelspace */
00761 void view3d_unproject(bglMats *mats, float out[3], const short x, const short y, const float z)
00762 {
00763     double ux, uy, uz;
00764 
00765     gluUnProject(x, y, z, mats->modelview, mats->projection,
00766                  (GLint *)mats->viewport, &ux, &uy, &uz);
00767 
00768     out[0] = ux;
00769     out[1] = uy;
00770     out[2] = uz;
00771 }
00772 
00773 /* use view3d_get_object_project_mat to get projecting mat */
00774 void ED_view3d_project_float_v2(const ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], float adr[2], float mat[4][4])
00775 {
00776     float vec4[4];
00777     
00778     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00779     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00780     /* adr[0]= IS_CLIPPED; */ /* always overwritten */
00781     
00782     mul_m4_v4(mat, vec4);
00783     
00784     if (vec4[3] > FLT_EPSILON) {
00785         adr[0] = (float)(ar->winx / 2.0f) + (ar->winx / 2.0f) * vec4[0] / vec4[3];
00786         adr[1] = (float)(ar->winy / 2.0f) + (ar->winy / 2.0f) * vec4[1] / vec4[3];
00787     }
00788     else {
00789         adr[0] = adr[1] = 0.0f;
00790     }
00791 }
00792 
00793 /* use view3d_get_object_project_mat to get projecting mat */
00794 void ED_view3d_project_float_v3(ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], float adr[3], float mat[4][4])
00795 {
00796     float vec4[4];
00797     
00798     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00799     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00800     /* adr[0]= IS_CLIPPED; */ /* always overwritten */
00801     
00802     mul_m4_v4(mat, vec4);
00803     
00804     if (vec4[3] > FLT_EPSILON) {
00805         adr[0] = (float)(ar->winx / 2.0f) + (ar->winx / 2.0f) * vec4[0] / vec4[3];
00806         adr[1] = (float)(ar->winy / 2.0f) + (ar->winy / 2.0f) * vec4[1] / vec4[3];
00807         adr[2] = vec4[2] / vec4[3];
00808     }
00809     else {
00810         zero_v3(adr);
00811     }
00812 }
00813 
00814 int ED_view3d_boundbox_clip(RegionView3D *rv3d, float obmat[][4], BoundBox *bb)
00815 {
00816     /* return 1: draw */
00817     
00818     float mat[4][4];
00819     float vec[4], min, max;
00820     int a, flag = -1, fl;
00821     
00822     if (bb == NULL) return 1;
00823     if (bb->flag & OB_BB_DISABLED) return 1;
00824     
00825     mult_m4_m4m4(mat, rv3d->persmat, obmat);
00826     
00827     for (a = 0; a < 8; a++) {
00828         copy_v3_v3(vec, bb->vec[a]);
00829         vec[3] = 1.0;
00830         mul_m4_v4(mat, vec);
00831         max = vec[3];
00832         min = -vec[3];
00833         
00834         fl = 0;
00835         if (vec[0] < min) fl += 1;
00836         if (vec[0] > max) fl += 2;
00837         if (vec[1] < min) fl += 4;
00838         if (vec[1] > max) fl += 8;
00839         if (vec[2] < min) fl += 16;
00840         if (vec[2] > max) fl += 32;
00841         
00842         flag &= fl;
00843         if (flag == 0) return 1;
00844     }
00845     
00846     return 0;
00847 }
00848 
00849 void project_short(ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], short adr[2])   /* clips */
00850 {
00851     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00852     float fx, fy, vec4[4];
00853     
00854     adr[0] = IS_CLIPPED;
00855     
00856     if (rv3d->rflag & RV3D_CLIPPING) {
00857         if (ED_view3d_clipping_test(rv3d, vec, FALSE)) {
00858             return;
00859         }
00860     }
00861     
00862     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00863     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00864     mul_m4_v4(rv3d->persmat, vec4);
00865     
00866     if (vec4[3] > (float)BL_NEAR_CLIP) {    /* 0.001 is the NEAR clipping cutoff for picking */
00867         fx = (ar->winx / 2) * (1 + vec4[0] / vec4[3]);
00868         
00869         if (fx > 0 && fx < ar->winx) {
00870             
00871             fy = (ar->winy / 2) * (1 + vec4[1] / vec4[3]);
00872             
00873             if (fy > 0.0f && fy < (float)ar->winy) {
00874                 adr[0] = (short)floor(fx);
00875                 adr[1] = (short)floor(fy);
00876             }
00877         }
00878     }
00879 }
00880 
00881 void project_int(ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], int adr[2])
00882 {
00883     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00884     float fx, fy, vec4[4];
00885     
00886     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00887     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00888     adr[0] = (int)2140000000.0f;
00889     
00890     mul_m4_v4(rv3d->persmat, vec4);
00891     
00892     if (vec4[3] > (float)BL_NEAR_CLIP) {    /* 0.001 is the NEAR clipping cutoff for picking */
00893         fx = (ar->winx / 2) * (1 + vec4[0] / vec4[3]);
00894         
00895         if (fx > -2140000000.0f && fx < 2140000000.0f) {
00896             fy = (ar->winy / 2) * (1 + vec4[1] / vec4[3]);
00897             
00898             if (fy > -2140000000.0f && fy < 2140000000.0f) {
00899                 adr[0] = (int)floor(fx);
00900                 adr[1] = (int)floor(fy);
00901             }
00902         }
00903     }
00904 }
00905 
00906 void project_int_noclip(ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], int adr[2])
00907 {
00908     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00909     float fx, fy, vec4[4];
00910     
00911     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00912     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00913     
00914     mul_m4_v4(rv3d->persmat, vec4);
00915     
00916     if (fabs(vec4[3]) > BL_NEAR_CLIP) {
00917         fx = (ar->winx / 2) * (1 + vec4[0] / vec4[3]);
00918         fy = (ar->winy / 2) * (1 + vec4[1] / vec4[3]);
00919         
00920         adr[0] = (int)floor(fx); 
00921         adr[1] = (int)floor(fy);
00922     }
00923     else {
00924         adr[0] = ar->winx / 2;
00925         adr[1] = ar->winy / 2;
00926     }
00927 }
00928 
00929 void project_short_noclip(ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], short adr[2])
00930 {
00931     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00932     float fx, fy, vec4[4];
00933     
00934     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00935     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00936     adr[0] = IS_CLIPPED;
00937     
00938     mul_m4_v4(rv3d->persmat, vec4);
00939     
00940     if (vec4[3] > (float)BL_NEAR_CLIP) {    /* 0.001 is the NEAR clipping cutoff for picking */
00941         fx = (ar->winx / 2) * (1 + vec4[0] / vec4[3]);
00942         
00943         if (fx > -32700 && fx < 32700) {
00944             
00945             fy = (ar->winy / 2) * (1 + vec4[1] / vec4[3]);
00946             
00947             if (fy > -32700.0f && fy < 32700.0f) {
00948                 adr[0] = (short)floor(fx);
00949                 adr[1] = (short)floor(fy);
00950             }
00951         }
00952     }
00953 }
00954 
00955 void apply_project_float(float persmat[4][4], int winx, int winy, const float vec[3], float adr[2])
00956 {
00957     float vec4[4];
00958 
00959     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00960     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00961     adr[0] = IS_CLIPPED;
00962 
00963     mul_m4_v4(persmat, vec4);
00964 
00965     if (vec4[3] > (float)BL_NEAR_CLIP) {
00966         adr[0] = (float)(winx / 2.0f) + (winx / 2.0f) * vec4[0] / vec4[3];
00967         adr[1] = (float)(winy / 2.0f) + (winy / 2.0f) * vec4[1] / vec4[3];
00968     }
00969 }
00970 
00971 void project_float(ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], float adr[2])
00972 {
00973     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00974 
00975     apply_project_float(rv3d->persmat, ar->winx, ar->winy, vec, adr);
00976 }
00977 
00978 void project_float_noclip(ARegion *ar, const float vec[3], float adr[2])
00979 {
00980     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00981     float vec4[4];
00982     
00983     copy_v3_v3(vec4, vec);
00984     vec4[3] = 1.0;
00985     
00986     mul_m4_v4(rv3d->persmat, vec4);
00987     
00988     if (fabs(vec4[3]) > BL_NEAR_CLIP) {
00989         adr[0] = (float)(ar->winx / 2.0f) + (ar->winx / 2.0f) * vec4[0] / vec4[3];
00990         adr[1] = (float)(ar->winy / 2.0f) + (ar->winy / 2.0f) * vec4[1] / vec4[3];
00991     }
00992     else {
00993         adr[0] = ar->winx / 2.0f;
00994         adr[1] = ar->winy / 2.0f;
00995     }
00996 }
00997 
00998 /* copies logic of get_view3d_viewplane(), keep in sync */
00999 int ED_view3d_clip_range_get(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, float *clipsta, float *clipend)
01000 {
01001     CameraParams params;
01002 
01003     camera_params_init(&params);
01004     camera_params_from_view3d(&params, v3d, rv3d);
01005 
01006     if (clipsta) *clipsta = params.clipsta;
01007     if (clipend) *clipend = params.clipend;
01008 
01009     return params.is_ortho;
01010 }
01011 
01012 /* also exposed in previewrender.c */
01013 int ED_view3d_viewplane_get(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, int winx, int winy,
01014                             rctf *viewplane, float *clipsta, float *clipend)
01015 {
01016     CameraParams params;
01017 
01018     camera_params_init(&params);
01019     camera_params_from_view3d(&params, v3d, rv3d);
01020     camera_params_compute_viewplane(&params, winx, winy, 1.0f, 1.0f);
01021 
01022     if (viewplane) *viewplane = params.viewplane;
01023     if (clipsta) *clipsta = params.clipsta;
01024     if (clipend) *clipend = params.clipend;
01025     
01026     return params.is_ortho;
01027 }
01028 
01029 void setwinmatrixview3d(ARegion *ar, View3D *v3d, rctf *rect)       /* rect: for picking */
01030 {
01031     RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01032     rctf viewplane;
01033     float clipsta, clipend, x1, y1, x2, y2;
01034     int orth;
01035     
01036     orth = ED_view3d_viewplane_get(v3d, rv3d, ar->winx, ar->winy, &viewplane, &clipsta, &clipend);
01037     rv3d->is_persp = !orth;
01038 
01039 #if 0
01040     printf("%s: %d %d %f %f %f %f %f %f\n", __func__, winx, winy,
01041            viewplane.xmin, viewplane.ymin, viewplane.xmax, viewplane.ymax,
01042            clipsta, clipend);
01043 #endif
01044 
01045     x1 = viewplane.xmin;
01046     y1 = viewplane.ymin;
01047     x2 = viewplane.xmax;
01048     y2 = viewplane.ymax;
01049 
01050     if (rect) {  /* picking */
01051         rect->xmin /= (float)ar->winx;
01052         rect->xmin = x1 + rect->xmin * (x2 - x1);
01053         rect->ymin /= (float)ar->winy;
01054         rect->ymin = y1 + rect->ymin * (y2 - y1);
01055         rect->xmax /= (float)ar->winx;
01056         rect->xmax = x1 + rect->xmax * (x2 - x1);
01057         rect->ymax /= (float)ar->winy;
01058         rect->ymax = y1 + rect->ymax * (y2 - y1);
01059         
01060         if (orth) wmOrtho(rect->xmin, rect->xmax, rect->ymin, rect->ymax, -clipend, clipend);
01061         else wmFrustum(rect->xmin, rect->xmax, rect->ymin, rect->ymax, clipsta, clipend);
01062         
01063     }
01064     else {
01065         if (orth) wmOrtho(x1, x2, y1, y2, clipsta, clipend);
01066         else wmFrustum(x1, x2, y1, y2, clipsta, clipend);
01067     }
01068 
01069     /* update matrix in 3d view region */
01070     glGetFloatv(GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX, (float *)rv3d->winmat);
01071 }
01072 
01073 static void obmat_to_viewmat(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, Object *ob, short smooth)
01074 {
01075     float bmat[4][4];
01076     float tmat[3][3];
01077     
01078     rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER; /* don't show the grid */
01079     
01080     copy_m4_m4(bmat, ob->obmat);
01081     normalize_m4(bmat);
01082     invert_m4_m4(rv3d->viewmat, bmat);
01083     
01084     /* view quat calculation, needed for add object */
01085     copy_m3_m4(tmat, rv3d->viewmat);
01086     if (smooth) {
01087         float new_quat[4];
01088         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && v3d->camera) {
01089             /* were from a camera view */
01090             
01091             float orig_ofs[3];
01092             float orig_dist = rv3d->dist;
01093             float orig_lens = v3d->lens;
01094             copy_v3_v3(orig_ofs, rv3d->ofs);
01095             
01096             /* Switch from camera view */
01097             mat3_to_quat(new_quat, tmat);
01098             
01099             rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
01100             rv3d->dist = 0.0;
01101             
01102             ED_view3d_from_object(v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, NULL, NULL, &v3d->lens);
01103             smooth_view(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, orig_ofs, new_quat, &orig_dist, &orig_lens); // XXX
01104             
01105             rv3d->persp = RV3D_CAMOB; /* just to be polite, not needed */
01106             
01107         }
01108         else {
01109             mat3_to_quat(new_quat, tmat);
01110             smooth_view(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, new_quat, NULL, NULL); // XXX
01111         }
01112     }
01113     else {
01114         mat3_to_quat(rv3d->viewquat, tmat);
01115     }
01116 }
01117 
01118 #define QUATSET(a, b, c, d, e) { a[0] = b; a[1] = c; a[2] = d; a[3] = e; } (void)0
01119 
01120 int ED_view3d_lock(RegionView3D *rv3d)
01121 {
01122     switch (rv3d->view) {
01123         case RV3D_VIEW_BOTTOM:
01124             QUATSET(rv3d->viewquat, 0.0, -1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01125             break;
01126 
01127         case RV3D_VIEW_BACK:
01128             QUATSET(rv3d->viewquat, 0.0, 0.0, (float)-cos(M_PI / 4.0), (float)-cos(M_PI / 4.0));
01129             break;
01130 
01131         case RV3D_VIEW_LEFT:
01132             QUATSET(rv3d->viewquat, 0.5, -0.5, 0.5, 0.5);
01133             break;
01134 
01135         case RV3D_VIEW_TOP:
01136             QUATSET(rv3d->viewquat, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
01137             break;
01138 
01139         case RV3D_VIEW_FRONT:
01140             QUATSET(rv3d->viewquat, (float)cos(M_PI / 4.0), (float)-sin(M_PI / 4.0), 0.0, 0.0);
01141             break;
01142 
01143         case RV3D_VIEW_RIGHT:
01144             QUATSET(rv3d->viewquat, 0.5, -0.5, -0.5, -0.5);
01145             break;
01146         default:
01147             return FALSE;
01148     }
01149 
01150     return TRUE;
01151 }
01152 
01153 /* don't set windows active in here, is used by renderwin too */
01154 void setviewmatrixview3d(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d)
01155 {
01156     if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {      /* obs/camera */
01157         if (v3d->camera) {
01158             where_is_object(scene, v3d->camera);    
01159             obmat_to_viewmat(v3d, rv3d, v3d->camera, 0);
01160         }
01161         else {
01162             quat_to_mat4(rv3d->viewmat, rv3d->viewquat);
01163             rv3d->viewmat[3][2] -= rv3d->dist;
01164         }
01165     }
01166     else {
01167         /* should be moved to better initialize later on XXX */
01168         if (rv3d->viewlock)
01169             ED_view3d_lock(rv3d);
01170         
01171         quat_to_mat4(rv3d->viewmat, rv3d->viewquat);
01172         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_PERSP) rv3d->viewmat[3][2] -= rv3d->dist;
01173         if (v3d->ob_centre) {
01174             Object *ob = v3d->ob_centre;
01175             float vec[3];
01176             
01177             copy_v3_v3(vec, ob->obmat[3]);
01178             if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE && v3d->ob_centre_bone[0]) {
01179                 bPoseChannel *pchan = get_pose_channel(ob->pose, v3d->ob_centre_bone);
01180                 if (pchan) {
01181                     copy_v3_v3(vec, pchan->pose_mat[3]);
01182                     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, vec);
01183                 }
01184             }
01185             translate_m4(rv3d->viewmat, -vec[0], -vec[1], -vec[2]);
01186         }
01187         else if (v3d->ob_centre_cursor) {
01188             float vec[3];
01189             copy_v3_v3(vec, give_cursor(scene, v3d));
01190             translate_m4(rv3d->viewmat, -vec[0], -vec[1], -vec[2]);
01191         }
01192         else translate_m4(rv3d->viewmat, rv3d->ofs[0], rv3d->ofs[1], rv3d->ofs[2]);
01193     }
01194 }
01195 
01196 /* IGLuint-> GLuint */
01197 /* Warning: be sure to account for a negative return value
01198  *   This is an error, "Too many objects in select buffer"
01199  *   and no action should be taken (can crash blender) if this happens
01200  */
01201 short view3d_opengl_select(ViewContext *vc, unsigned int *buffer, unsigned int bufsize, rcti *input)
01202 {
01203     Scene *scene = vc->scene;
01204     View3D *v3d = vc->v3d;
01205     ARegion *ar = vc->ar;
01206     rctf rect;
01207     short code, hits;
01208     char dt, dtx;
01209     
01210     G.f |= G_PICKSEL;
01211     
01212     /* case not a border select */
01213     if (input->xmin == input->xmax) {
01214         rect.xmin = input->xmin - 12; // seems to be default value for bones only now
01215         rect.xmax = input->xmin + 12;
01216         rect.ymin = input->ymin - 12;
01217         rect.ymax = input->ymin + 12;
01218     }
01219     else {
01220         rect.xmin = input->xmin;
01221         rect.xmax = input->xmax;
01222         rect.ymin = input->ymin;
01223         rect.ymax = input->ymax;
01224     }
01225     
01226     setwinmatrixview3d(ar, v3d, &rect);
01227     mult_m4_m4m4(vc->rv3d->persmat, vc->rv3d->winmat, vc->rv3d->viewmat);
01228     
01229     if (v3d->drawtype > OB_WIRE) {
01230         v3d->zbuf = TRUE;
01231         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01232     }
01233     
01234     if (vc->rv3d->rflag & RV3D_CLIPPING)
01235         ED_view3d_clipping_set(vc->rv3d);
01236     
01237     glSelectBuffer(bufsize, (GLuint *)buffer);
01238     glRenderMode(GL_SELECT);
01239     glInitNames();  /* these two calls whatfor? It doesnt work otherwise */
01240     glPushName(-1);
01241     code = 1;
01242     
01243     if (vc->obedit && vc->obedit->type == OB_MBALL) {
01244         draw_object(scene, ar, v3d, BASACT, DRAW_PICKING | DRAW_CONSTCOLOR);
01245     }
01246     else if ((vc->obedit && vc->obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE)) {
01247         /* if not drawing sketch, draw bones */
01248         if (!BDR_drawSketchNames(vc)) {
01249             draw_object(scene, ar, v3d, BASACT, DRAW_PICKING | DRAW_CONSTCOLOR);
01250         }
01251     }
01252     else {
01253         Base *base;
01254         
01255         v3d->xray = TRUE;    // otherwise it postpones drawing
01256         for (base = scene->base.first; base; base = base->next) {
01257             if (base->lay & v3d->lay) {
01258                 
01259                 if (base->object->restrictflag & OB_RESTRICT_SELECT)
01260                     base->selcol = 0;
01261                 else {
01262                     base->selcol = code;
01263                     glLoadName(code);
01264                     draw_object(scene, ar, v3d, base, DRAW_PICKING | DRAW_CONSTCOLOR);
01265                     
01266                     /* we draw group-duplicators for selection too */
01267                     if ((base->object->transflag & OB_DUPLI) && base->object->dup_group) {
01268                         ListBase *lb;
01269                         DupliObject *dob;
01270                         Base tbase;
01271                         
01272                         tbase.flag = OB_FROMDUPLI;
01273                         lb = object_duplilist(scene, base->object);
01274                         
01275                         for (dob = lb->first; dob; dob = dob->next) {
01276                             tbase.object = dob->ob;
01277                             copy_m4_m4(dob->ob->obmat, dob->mat);
01278                             
01279                             /* extra service: draw the duplicator in drawtype of parent */
01280                             /* MIN2 for the drawtype to allow bounding box objects in groups for lods */
01281                             dt = tbase.object->dt;   tbase.object->dt = MIN2(tbase.object->dt, base->object->dt);
01282                             dtx = tbase.object->dtx; tbase.object->dtx = base->object->dtx;
01283 
01284                             draw_object(scene, ar, v3d, &tbase, DRAW_PICKING | DRAW_CONSTCOLOR);
01285                             
01286                             tbase.object->dt = dt;
01287                             tbase.object->dtx = dtx;
01288 
01289                             copy_m4_m4(dob->ob->obmat, dob->omat);
01290                         }
01291                         free_object_duplilist(lb);
01292                     }
01293                     code++;
01294                 }               
01295             }
01296         }
01297         v3d->xray = FALSE;   // restore
01298     }
01299     
01300     glPopName();    /* see above (pushname) */
01301     hits = glRenderMode(GL_RENDER);
01302     
01303     G.f &= ~G_PICKSEL;
01304     setwinmatrixview3d(ar, v3d, NULL);
01305     mult_m4_m4m4(vc->rv3d->persmat, vc->rv3d->winmat, vc->rv3d->viewmat);
01306     
01307     if (v3d->drawtype > OB_WIRE) {
01308         v3d->zbuf = 0;
01309         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
01310     }
01311 // XXX  persp(PERSP_WIN);
01312     
01313     if (vc->rv3d->rflag & RV3D_CLIPPING)
01314         ED_view3d_clipping_disable();
01315     
01316     if (hits < 0) printf("Too many objects in select buffer\n");  // XXX make error message
01317     
01318     return hits;
01319 }
01320 
01321 /* ********************** local view operator ******************** */
01322 
01323 static unsigned int free_localbit(Main *bmain)
01324 {
01325     unsigned int lay;
01326     ScrArea *sa;
01327     bScreen *sc;
01328     
01329     lay = 0;
01330     
01331     /* sometimes we loose a localview: when an area is closed */
01332     /* check all areas: which localviews are in use? */
01333     for (sc = bmain->screen.first; sc; sc = sc->id.next) {
01334         for (sa = sc->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
01335             SpaceLink *sl = sa->spacedata.first;
01336             for (; sl; sl = sl->next) {
01337                 if (sl->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D) {
01338                     View3D *v3d = (View3D *) sl;
01339                     lay |= v3d->lay;
01340                 }
01341             }
01342         }
01343     }
01344     
01345     if ((lay & 0x01000000) == 0) return 0x01000000;
01346     if ((lay & 0x02000000) == 0) return 0x02000000;
01347     if ((lay & 0x04000000) == 0) return 0x04000000;
01348     if ((lay & 0x08000000) == 0) return 0x08000000;
01349     if ((lay & 0x10000000) == 0) return 0x10000000;
01350     if ((lay & 0x20000000) == 0) return 0x20000000;
01351     if ((lay & 0x40000000) == 0) return 0x40000000;
01352     if ((lay & 0x80000000) == 0) return 0x80000000;
01353     
01354     return 0;
01355 }
01356 
01357 int ED_view3d_scene_layer_set(int lay, const int *values, int *active)
01358 {
01359     int i, tot = 0;
01360     
01361     /* ensure we always have some layer selected */
01362     for (i = 0; i < 20; i++)
01363         if (values[i])
01364             tot++;
01365     
01366     if (tot == 0)
01367         return lay;
01368     
01369     for (i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
01370         
01371         if (active) {
01372             /* if this value has just been switched on, make that layer active */
01373             if (values[i] && (lay & (1 << i)) == 0) {
01374                 *active = (1 << i);
01375             }
01376         }
01377             
01378         if (values[i]) lay |= (1 << i);
01379         else lay &= ~(1 << i);
01380     }
01381     
01382     /* ensure always an active layer */
01383     if (active && (lay & *active) == 0) {
01384         for (i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
01385             if (lay & (1 << i)) {
01386                 *active = 1 << i;
01387                 break;
01388             }
01389         }
01390     }
01391     
01392     return lay;
01393 }
01394 
01395 static void initlocalview(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, ScrArea *sa)
01396 {
01397     View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
01398     Base *base;
01399     float size = 0.0, min[3], max[3], box[3];
01400     unsigned int locallay;
01401     int ok = 0;
01402 
01403     if (v3d->localvd) return;
01404 
01405     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
01406 
01407     locallay = free_localbit(bmain);
01408 
01409     if (locallay == 0) {
01410         printf("Sorry, no more than 8 localviews\n");   // XXX error
01411         ok = 0;
01412     }
01413     else {
01414         if (scene->obedit) {
01415             minmax_object(scene->obedit, min, max);
01416             
01417             ok = 1;
01418         
01419             BASACT->lay |= locallay;
01420             scene->obedit->lay = BASACT->lay;
01421         }
01422         else {
01423             for (base = FIRSTBASE; base; base = base->next) {
01424                 if (TESTBASE(v3d, base)) {
01425                     minmax_object(base->object, min, max);
01426                     base->lay |= locallay;
01427                     base->object->lay = base->lay;
01428                     ok = 1;
01429                 }
01430             }
01431         }
01432         
01433         box[0] = (max[0] - min[0]);
01434         box[1] = (max[1] - min[1]);
01435         box[2] = (max[2] - min[2]);
01436         size = MAX3(box[0], box[1], box[2]);
01437         if (size <= 0.01f) size = 0.01f;
01438     }
01439     
01440     if (ok) {
01441         ARegion *ar;
01442         
01443         v3d->localvd = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(View3D), "localview");
01444         
01445         memcpy(v3d->localvd, v3d, sizeof(View3D));
01446 
01447         for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
01448             if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
01449                 RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01450 
01451                 rv3d->localvd = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(RegionView3D), "localview region");
01452                 memcpy(rv3d->localvd, rv3d, sizeof(RegionView3D));
01453                 
01454                 rv3d->ofs[0] = -(min[0] + max[0]) / 2.0f;
01455                 rv3d->ofs[1] = -(min[1] + max[1]) / 2.0f;
01456                 rv3d->ofs[2] = -(min[2] + max[2]) / 2.0f;
01457 
01458                 rv3d->dist = size;
01459                 /* perspective should be a bit farther away to look nice */
01460                 if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_ORTHO)
01461                     rv3d->dist *= 0.7f;
01462 
01463                 // correction for window aspect ratio
01464                 if (ar->winy > 2 && ar->winx > 2) {
01465                     float asp = (float)ar->winx / (float)ar->winy;
01466                     if (asp < 1.0f) asp = 1.0f / asp;
01467                     rv3d->dist *= asp;
01468                 }
01469                 
01470                 if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
01471                 
01472                 v3d->cursor[0] = -rv3d->ofs[0];
01473                 v3d->cursor[1] = -rv3d->ofs[1];
01474                 v3d->cursor[2] = -rv3d->ofs[2];
01475             }
01476         }
01477         
01478         v3d->lay = locallay;
01479     }
01480     else {
01481         /* clear flags */ 
01482         for (base = FIRSTBASE; base; base = base->next) {
01483             if (base->lay & locallay) {
01484                 base->lay -= locallay;
01485                 if (base->lay == 0) base->lay = v3d->layact;
01486                 if (base->object != scene->obedit) base->flag |= SELECT;
01487                 base->object->lay = base->lay;
01488             }
01489         }       
01490     }
01491 
01492 }
01493 
01494 static void restore_localviewdata(ScrArea *sa, int free)
01495 {
01496     ARegion *ar;
01497     View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
01498     
01499     if (v3d->localvd == NULL) return;
01500     
01501     v3d->near = v3d->localvd->near;
01502     v3d->far = v3d->localvd->far;
01503     v3d->lay = v3d->localvd->lay;
01504     v3d->layact = v3d->localvd->layact;
01505     v3d->drawtype = v3d->localvd->drawtype;
01506     v3d->camera = v3d->localvd->camera;
01507     
01508     if (free) {
01509         MEM_freeN(v3d->localvd);
01510         v3d->localvd = NULL;
01511     }
01512     
01513     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
01514         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
01515             RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
01516             
01517             if (rv3d->localvd) {
01518                 rv3d->dist = rv3d->localvd->dist;
01519                 copy_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, rv3d->localvd->ofs);
01520                 copy_qt_qt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->localvd->viewquat);
01521                 rv3d->view = rv3d->localvd->view;
01522                 rv3d->persp = rv3d->localvd->persp;
01523                 rv3d->camzoom = rv3d->localvd->camzoom;
01524 
01525                 if (free) {
01526                     MEM_freeN(rv3d->localvd);
01527                     rv3d->localvd = NULL;
01528                 }
01529             }
01530         }
01531     }
01532 }
01533 
01534 static void endlocalview(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, ScrArea *sa)
01535 {
01536     View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
01537     struct Base *base;
01538     unsigned int locallay;
01539     
01540     if (v3d->localvd) {
01541         
01542         locallay = v3d->lay & 0xFF000000;
01543         
01544         restore_localviewdata(sa, 1); // 1 = free
01545 
01546         /* for when in other window the layers have changed */
01547         if (v3d->scenelock) v3d->lay = scene->lay;
01548         
01549         for (base = FIRSTBASE; base; base = base->next) {
01550             if (base->lay & locallay) {
01551                 base->lay -= locallay;
01552                 if (base->lay == 0) base->lay = v3d->layact;
01553                 if (base->object != scene->obedit) {
01554                     base->flag |= SELECT;
01555                     base->object->flag |= SELECT;
01556                 }
01557                 base->object->lay = base->lay;
01558             }
01559         }
01560         
01561         DAG_on_visible_update(bmain, FALSE);
01562     } 
01563 }
01564 
01565 static int localview_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(unused))
01566 {
01567     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
01568     
01569     if (v3d->localvd)
01570         endlocalview(CTX_data_main(C), CTX_data_scene(C), CTX_wm_area(C));
01571     else
01572         initlocalview(CTX_data_main(C), CTX_data_scene(C), CTX_wm_area(C));
01573     
01574     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
01575     
01576     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01577 }
01578 
01579 void VIEW3D_OT_localview(wmOperatorType *ot)
01580 {
01581     
01582     /* identifiers */
01583     ot->name = "Local View";
01584     ot->description = "Toggle display of selected object(s) separately and centered in view";
01585     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_localview";
01586     
01587     /* api callbacks */
01588     ot->exec = localview_exec;
01589     ot->flag = OPTYPE_UNDO; /* localview changes object layer bitflags */
01590     
01591     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
01592 }

01596 static ListBase queue_back;
01597 static void SaveState(bContext *C, wmWindow *win)
01598 {
01599     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
01600     
01601     glPushAttrib(GL_ALL_ATTRIB_BITS);
01602 
01603     if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT)
01604         GPU_paint_set_mipmap(1);
01605     
01606     queue_back = win->queue;
01607     
01608     win->queue.first = win->queue.last = NULL;
01609     
01610     //XXX waitcursor(1);
01611 }
01612 
01613 static void RestoreState(bContext *C, wmWindow *win)
01614 {
01615     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
01616     
01617     if (obact && obact->mode & OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT)
01618         GPU_paint_set_mipmap(0);
01619 
01620     //XXX curarea->win_swap = 0;
01621     //XXX curarea->head_swap=0;
01622     //XXX allqueue(REDRAWVIEW3D, 1);
01623     //XXX allqueue(REDRAWBUTSALL, 0);
01624     //XXX reset_slowparents();
01625     //XXX waitcursor(0);
01626     //XXX G.qual= 0;
01627     
01628     if (win) /* check because closing win can set to NULL */
01629         win->queue = queue_back;
01630     
01631     GPU_state_init();
01632     GPU_set_tpage(NULL, 0, 0);
01633 
01634     glPopAttrib();
01635 }
01636 
01637 /* was space_set_commmandline_options in 2.4x */
01638 static void game_set_commmandline_options(GameData *gm)
01639 {
01640     SYS_SystemHandle syshandle;
01641     int test;
01642 
01643     if ( (syshandle = SYS_GetSystem()) ) {
01644         /* User defined settings */
01645         test = (U.gameflags & USER_DISABLE_MIPMAP);
01646         GPU_set_mipmap(!test);
01647         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "nomipmap", test);
01648 
01649         /* File specific settings: */
01650         /* Only test the first one. These two are switched
01651          * simultaneously. */
01652         test = (gm->flag & GAME_SHOW_FRAMERATE);
01653         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "show_framerate", test);
01654         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "show_profile", test);
01655 
01656         test = (gm->flag & GAME_SHOW_DEBUG_PROPS);
01657         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "show_properties", test);
01658 
01659         test = (gm->flag & GAME_SHOW_PHYSICS);
01660         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "show_physics", test);
01661 
01662         test = (gm->flag & GAME_ENABLE_ALL_FRAMES);
01663         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "fixedtime", test);
01664 
01665         test = (gm->flag & GAME_ENABLE_ANIMATION_RECORD);
01666         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "animation_record", test);
01667 
01668         test = (gm->flag & GAME_IGNORE_DEPRECATION_WARNINGS);
01669         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "ignore_deprecation_warnings", test);
01670 
01671         test = (gm->matmode == GAME_MAT_MULTITEX);
01672         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "blender_material", test);
01673         test = (gm->matmode == GAME_MAT_GLSL);
01674         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "blender_glsl_material", test);
01675         test = (gm->flag & GAME_DISPLAY_LISTS);
01676         SYS_WriteCommandLineInt(syshandle, "displaylists", test);
01677 
01678 
01679     }
01680 }
01681 
01682 #endif // WITH_GAMEENGINE
01683 
01684 static int game_engine_poll(bContext *C)
01685 {
01686     /* we need a context and area to launch BGE
01687      * it's a temporary solution to avoid crash at load time
01688      * if we try to auto run the BGE. Ideally we want the
01689      * context to be set as soon as we load the file. */
01690 
01691     if (CTX_wm_window(C) == NULL) return 0;
01692     if (CTX_wm_screen(C) == NULL) return 0;
01693     if (CTX_wm_area(C) == NULL) return 0;
01694 
01695     if (CTX_data_mode_enum(C) != CTX_MODE_OBJECT)
01696         return 0;
01697 
01698     return 1;
01699 }
01700 
01701 int ED_view3d_context_activate(bContext *C)
01702 {
01703     bScreen *sc = CTX_wm_screen(C);
01704     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01705     ARegion *ar;
01706 
01707     /* sa can be NULL when called from python */
01708     if (sa == NULL || sa->spacetype != SPACE_VIEW3D)
01709         for (sa = sc->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next)
01710             if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D)
01711                 break;
01712 
01713     if (!sa)
01714         return 0;
01715     
01716     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next)
01717         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW)
01718             break;
01719     
01720     if (!ar)
01721         return 0;
01722     
01723     // bad context switch ..
01724     CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa);
01725     CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
01726 
01727     return 1;
01728 }
01729 
01730 static int game_engine_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01731 {
01732 #ifdef WITH_GAMEENGINE
01733     Scene *startscene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01734     ScrArea /* *sa, */ /* UNUSED */ *prevsa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01735     ARegion *ar, *prevar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01736     wmWindow *prevwin = CTX_wm_window(C);
01737     RegionView3D *rv3d;
01738     rcti cam_frame;
01739 
01740     (void)op; /* unused */
01741     
01742     // bad context switch ..
01743     if (!ED_view3d_context_activate(C))
01744         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01745     
01746     /* redraw to hide any menus/popups, we don't go back to
01747      * the window manager until after this operator exits */
01748     WM_redraw_windows(C);
01749 
01750     rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
01751     /* sa= CTX_wm_area(C); */ /* UNUSED */
01752     ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01753 
01754     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
01755     
01756     game_set_commmandline_options(&startscene->gm);
01757 
01758     if ((rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) &&
01759         (startscene->gm.framing.type == SCE_GAMEFRAMING_BARS) &&
01760         (startscene->gm.stereoflag != STEREO_DOME))
01761     {
01762         /* Letterbox */
01763         rctf cam_framef;
01764         ED_view3d_calc_camera_border(startscene, ar, CTX_wm_view3d(C), rv3d, &cam_framef, FALSE);
01765         cam_frame.xmin = cam_framef.xmin + ar->winrct.xmin;
01766         cam_frame.xmax = cam_framef.xmax + ar->winrct.xmin;
01767         cam_frame.ymin = cam_framef.ymin + ar->winrct.ymin;
01768         cam_frame.ymax = cam_framef.ymax + ar->winrct.ymin;
01769         BLI_isect_rcti(&ar->winrct, &cam_frame, &cam_frame);
01770     }
01771     else {
01772         cam_frame.xmin = ar->winrct.xmin;
01773         cam_frame.xmax = ar->winrct.xmax;
01774         cam_frame.ymin = ar->winrct.ymin;
01775         cam_frame.ymax = ar->winrct.ymax;
01776     }
01777 
01778 
01779     SaveState(C, prevwin);
01780 
01781     StartKetsjiShell(C, ar, &cam_frame, 1);
01782 
01783     /* window wasnt closed while the BGE was running */
01784     if (BLI_findindex(&CTX_wm_manager(C)->windows, prevwin) == -1) {
01785         prevwin = NULL;
01786         CTX_wm_window_set(C, NULL);
01787     }
01788     
01789     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
01790 
01791     if (prevwin) {
01792         /* restore context, in case it changed in the meantime, for
01793          * example by working in another window or closing it */
01794         CTX_wm_region_set(C, prevar);
01795         CTX_wm_window_set(C, prevwin);
01796         CTX_wm_area_set(C, prevsa);
01797     }
01798 
01799     RestoreState(C, prevwin);
01800 
01801     //XXX restore_all_scene_cfra(scene_cfra_store);
01802     set_scene_bg(CTX_data_main(C), startscene);
01803     //XXX scene_update_for_newframe(bmain, scene, scene->lay);
01804 
01805     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01806 #else
01807     (void)C; /* unused */
01808     BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Game engine is disabled in this build");
01809     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01810 #endif
01811 }
01812 
01813 void VIEW3D_OT_game_start(wmOperatorType *ot)
01814 {
01815     
01816     /* identifiers */
01817     ot->name = "Start Game Engine";
01818     ot->description = "Start game engine";
01819     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_game_start";
01820     
01821     /* api callbacks */
01822     ot->exec = game_engine_exec;
01823     
01824     ot->poll = game_engine_poll;
01825 }
01826 
01827 /* ************************************** */
01828 
01829 static void UNUSED_FUNCTION(view3d_align_axis_to_vector)(View3D *v3d, RegionView3D *rv3d, int axisidx, float vec[3])
01830 {
01831     float alignaxis[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
01832     float norm[3], axis[3], angle, new_quat[4];
01833     
01834     if (axisidx > 0) alignaxis[axisidx - 1] = 1.0;
01835     else alignaxis[-axisidx - 1] = -1.0;
01836 
01837     normalize_v3_v3(norm, vec);
01838 
01839     angle = (float)acos(dot_v3v3(alignaxis, norm));
01840     cross_v3_v3v3(axis, alignaxis, norm);
01841     axis_angle_to_quat(new_quat, axis, -angle);
01842     
01843     rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER;
01844     
01845     if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && v3d->camera) {
01846         /* switch out of camera view */
01847         float orig_ofs[3];
01848         float orig_dist = rv3d->dist;
01849         float orig_lens = v3d->lens;
01850         
01851         copy_v3_v3(orig_ofs, rv3d->ofs);
01852         rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;
01853         rv3d->dist = 0.0;
01854         ED_view3d_from_object(v3d->camera, rv3d->ofs, NULL, NULL, &v3d->lens);
01855         smooth_view(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, orig_ofs, new_quat, &orig_dist, &orig_lens); // XXX
01856     }
01857     else {
01858         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;  /* switch out of camera mode */
01859         smooth_view(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, new_quat, NULL, NULL); // XXX
01860     }
01861 }
01862 
01863 float ED_view3d_pixel_size(struct RegionView3D *rv3d, const float co[3])
01864 {
01865     return (rv3d->persmat[3][3] + (
01866                 rv3d->persmat[0][3] * co[0] +
01867                 rv3d->persmat[1][3] * co[1] +
01868                 rv3d->persmat[2][3] * co[2])
01869             ) * rv3d->pixsize;
01870 }

01889 
01890 void ED_view3d_operator_properties_viewmat_set(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01891 {
01892     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
01893     RegionView3D *rv3d = ED_view3d_context_rv3d(C);
01894 
01895     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "region_width"))
01896         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "region_width", ar->winx);
01897 
01898     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "region_height"))
01899         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "region_height", ar->winy);
01900 
01901     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "perspective_matrix"))
01902         RNA_float_set_array(op->ptr, "perspective_matrix", (float *)rv3d->persmat);
01903 }
01904 
01905 void ED_view3d_operator_properties_viewmat_get(wmOperator *op, int *winx, int *winy, float persmat[4][4])
01906 {
01907     *winx = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "region_width");
01908     *winy = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "region_height");
01909 
01910     RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "perspective_matrix", (float *)persmat);
01911 }
